paBootstrapBucketName.Description: Existing S3 bucket which is having PA-Bootstrap configuration

LambdaFunctionsBucketName.Description: Existing S3 bucket name which is having the Lambda funtions zip

VpnConfigBucketName.Description: Creates a S3-bucket for VPN Configuration files. NOTE: Do not use Capitals and S3 bucket names are globally unique, regardless of the AWS Region and AWS Account. So please prepend/append your aws account number to the name of bucket to avoid stack creation failure

SubscriberAWSAccountNumber.Description: Subscriber AWS Account number(s) required for Assume Role, Provide a valid 12-digit AWS Account Number, Please provide comma separated account numbers if you have morethan one subscriber aws account

PaloAltoGroupCapacity.Description: The Maximum number of VPN connection supported for PA-Group

LambdaZipFile.Description: Lambda code zip filename which is stored in above mentioned Required parameters LambdaFunctionsBucketName

transitVpcCidr.Description: Give the VPC CIDR range to create Transit VPC

NatInstanceType.Description: Instance type to use for NAT

sshKey.Description: SSH key to associate with PA Server

dmzAz1Cidr.Description: Give the CIDR range to create DMZ Subnet AZ1

dmzAz2Cidr.Description: Give the CIDR range to create DMZ Subnet AZ2

pdmzAz1Cidr.Description: Give the CIDR range to create pDMZ Subnet AZ1

pdmzAz2Cidr.Description: Give the CIDR range to create pDMZ Subnet AZ2

mgmtAz1Cidr.Description: Give the CIDR range to create MGMT Subnet AZ1

mgmtAz2Cidr.Description: Give the CIDR range to create MGMT Subnet AZ2

trustedSource.Description: Trusted source to allow access to PA MGMT interface

Properties.GroupDescription: Allow SSH/API access from trusted source

Properties.Description: Launch CFT stack to Create New PaGroup
State Machine choice Type default state Lambda

PaBootstrapBucketAccessRole.Description: IAM role to allow access to transit VPC S3 bucket

PaBootstrapBucketName.Description: IAM role to allow access to transit VPC S3 bucket

SshKeyName.Description: SSH Key to connect to servers

TransitAssumeRoleArn.Description: Transit Assume Role Arn, This will be given and Parameter while launching Subscriber Initialization CFT

TransitSnsArn.Description: Transit SNS Topic Arn, This will be given and Parameter while launching Subscriber Initialization CFT
